title: [2025.08] [EMNLP2025] One paper accepted to EMNLP2025 findings (Long).

[2025.05] [ACL2025] One paper accepted to ACL2025 findings (Short).
[2025.01] [NAACL2025] One paper accepted to NAACL2025 findings (Short).
content:
Computer Science 분야 우수국제학술대회인

NAACL2025(2025 Annual Conference of the Nations of the Americas Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics)에서 논문을 발표한 도주선 학생을 소개합니다.


저자: 도주선(학사과정 기계공학부, 인공지능학과 복수전공), 황재성(학사과정 인공지능학과), 지도교수 권진근(인공지능학과),

     Hidetaka Kamigaito (나라선단과학기술대학), Manabu Okumura (도쿄공업대학)


논문제목: Considering Length Diversity in Retrieval-Augmented Summarization

학술지명: 2025 Annual Conference of the Nations of the Americas Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics

발표일자: 2025.4.29.

title: [2024.05] [ACL2024] One paper accepted to ACL2024 findings (Long).
content:
Computer Science 분야 우수국제학술대회인

ACL2024(The 62nd Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics)

에서 논문을 발표한 도주선 학생을 소개합니다.


저자: 도주선(학사과정 기계공학부, 인공지능학과 복수전공), 지도교수 권진근(인공지능학과),

     Hidetaka Kamigaito (나라선단과학기술대학), Manabu Okumura (도쿄공업대학)


논문제목: InstructCMP: Length Control in Sentence Compression through Instruction-based Large Language Models

학술지명: The 62nd Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics

발표일자: 2024.8.11.
